function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of implementation of precautionary measures in health club facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of health club facility risks in relation to pandemic propagation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent implementation of precautionary measures across modular health club facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate precautionary measures in sports facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of quantifiable measures in the assessment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic impacts on public and private sports organizations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of detailed poe studies for health club facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of schematics instead of accurate drawings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited descriptive material based on quantitative methods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global lack of access to vaccines","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in cancer diagnoses due to pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Missed regular vaccinations for other infectious diseases during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Racial minorities at higher risk of infection","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Socioeconomically deprived populations vulnerable to nphis targeting covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consensus on trust in nphi effectiveness","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effectiveness of nphis is challenging to evaluate due to different measures and study types used","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Single studies conducted in specific communities may not provide conclusive evidence of nphi effectiveness","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of bias in comparing outcomes of communities with and without nphis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inclusion of studies using mathematical modelling for simulations and predictions may present a risk of bias in the review","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exclusion of studies targeting specific populations may lead to a limited understanding of the effects of nphis on those populations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to receive additional information from corresponding authors may result in incomplete data for the meta-analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Collaborative data extraction involving multiple investigators may lead to variations in data interpretation and extraction.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disagreements during the screening and review process may lead to delays in study completion and potential bias in study inclusion.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Assessment of study methodology using subjective tools may introduce bias and affect the validity of the findings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conducting meta-analyses without proper consideration of study quality and bias may lead to inaccurate conclusions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of publication bias may lead to overestimation or underestimation of treatment effects.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Converting outcome measures to daily basis using inaccurate formulas or methods may result in flawed data analysis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate data for estimating the effect size","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Majority of studies from a limited number of countries us and china","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Observational quasi-experimental study designs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in covid-19 indicators during and after lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Slight effects of lockdown on decreasing case growth rate","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effectiveness in reducing daily incidence rates and death trends","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective decrease in mortality growth rate after lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of individual social distancing measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Heterogeneity and publication bias in meta-analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possible publication bias in the study","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High heterogeneity among studies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Missed cases in the trim-and-fill test","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Late adoption of nphis leading to icu saturation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in measuring unique impact of specific nphis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic impact of early nphis such as lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Demographic characteristics and population densities impacting the effectiveness of nphis in controlling covid-19 spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited number of studies considering demographic and geographic factors in analyzing the effectiveness of nphis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of the role of health data infrastructures in evaluating nphi effectiveness in pandemics.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Under-reporting of data due to mass panic in low-resource countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliability and validity of publicly available data from countries with poor data infrastructure","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Observational nature of included studies and lack of clinical trials due to the findings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Confounding effect of covid-19 diagnosis testing considerations on outcomes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
